source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_00<tab>Bloeidin could use your aid in creating a diversion.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・オーバールックのブルーエイディン少甲佐は、冒険者に共同作戦を提案したいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_01<tab>Bloeidin has a mind to destroy a new crucible that the alchemically inclined kobolds have developed, and has tasked you with creating a diversion. Travel to Iron Lake and use the makeshift bombs provided by the commander to blow up piles of kobold supplies to draw their attention away from the primary target.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_01<tab>ブルーエイディン少甲佐から、陽動作戦を仕掛けてくれるよう依頼された。アイアンレイクにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D4201 /var>」を「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E878801 /var>」で爆破しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_02<tab>You have destroyed the kobold supplies as per your orders. Return to Bloeidin and inquire as to the success of the mission.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D4201 /var>を爆破することができた。ブルーエイディン側の首尾はどうだろうか。キャンプ・オーバールックに戻って「ブルーエイディン少甲佐」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_03<tab>Bloeidin informs you that, thanks in no small part to your efforts, the operation was a success. The loss of their crucible should take the wind out of the kobolds' sails for the foreseeable future.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者の陽動作戦が功を奏し、ブルーエイディン少甲佐の作戦は成功したようだ。コボルド族も、しばらくは大きな動きを見せることはないだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_TODO_00<tab>Use makeshift bombs to blow up kobold supplies.

target: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_TODO_01<tab>ブルーエイディン少甲佐に報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_000<tab>Well, we can't let my men have all the fun, now can we? What say you join us in a little operation that's sure to hit the kobolds where it hurts the most─in the crucible.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_000さっそく、コボルド族の出鼻を挫こうじゃねぇか。
俺たちは奴らが新たに導入した、
「新型錬金釜」の破壊作戦を実行する。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_001<tab>As you know, the beasts pride themselves on their alchemical skills. We've located a hidden storehouse containing a prototype for a new crucible. I don't know what it's capable of, and I'm not of a mind to find out. I would charge you with drawing the kobolds' attention while my levy sees to the crucible.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_001お前には、連中の目を逸らすための陽動を頼みたい。
手薄になった新型錬金釜の管理庫は、
俺の部下がぶっ壊すからよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_002<tab>Take these makeshift bombs to Iron Lake, where you'll find stores of sundry provisions belonging to the kobold army─I trust you'll know what to do from there. And mind you: the bigger the explosion, the better.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_002「アイアンレイク」に行き、「」を、
この「」を使って、派手に爆発してくれ。
さぁ、祭りのはじまりだ！
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_DUMMY_000_000<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E878801 /var>」を使って、コボルド軍の物資を破壊する×３

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_010<tab>Good work─why, I reckon I heard those blasts all the way from here! You'll be pleased to know that the operation was a rousing success: the crucible is no more.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_010よう、戻ってきたか！
お前の陽動のおかげで、作戦は大成功だったぜ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_011<tab>Aye, this should keep the kobolds quiet for a spell. Ah, nothin' like the pleasure of a job well done. I reckon the grog we guzzle tonight will be the finest we've had in months.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC707_01019_BLOEIDIN_000_011これでしばらくは、コボルド族の連中も、
おとなしくなるだろうさ。
あとは、これで報酬がもらえればバッチリだな。
